SENT.plain: We present the cytogenetic pattern of a leukemic infant with Diamond-Blackfan anemia (DBA)
The karyotype was characterized by clonal evolution involving consecutive gains of chromosome 21 up to pentasomy
No chromosomal changes were present in normal lymphocytes
Such a karyotype evolution has been described in some cases of acute leukemia associated with Down Syndrome, but rarely in non-Down cases
